analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/18/0x7d2296b840eb80dd6bd09d3fa1a5bc9bedda8db2.sol:
	Contract FPAY has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/18/0x7d2296b840eb80dd6bd09d3fa1a5bc9bedda8db2.sol#219)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/18/0x7d2296b840eb80dd6bd09d3fa1a5bc9bedda8db2.sol#89) is not in mixedCase
